column2: By eight o'clock not an inch of ground in front of the platform was unoccupied.

column2: The County Court was the sheriff's, who sat there surrounded by the bishop and the magnates of the county;

column2: The weekly introduction of food, to which I shall presently refer, formed the basis of luxurious banquets, washed down by liquor
